long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily calculate taxes and gross profit with this convenient Chrome extension! Perfect for small business owners, accountants, and financial professionals.

What it does:
Quickly calculate tax amounts and gross profit margins
Simple and intuitive interface
Easy to use and fast calculations

Features:
Tax calculator: Calculate tax amounts based on gross income
Gross profit calculator: Calculate gross profit margins based on revenue and cost
